dk.statsbiblioteket.util.qa
Class PackageScanner

java.lang.Object
  dk.statsbiblioteket.util.qa.PackageScanner

@QAInfo(level=NORMAL,
        state=QA_NEEDED,
        author="mke",
        revision="$Id: PackageScanner.java,v 1.10 2007/12/04 13:22:01 mke Exp $")
public class PackageScanner
extends java.lang.Object

Scan a package for QAInfo annotations and output collected data via a Report.

Constructor Detail

PackageScanner

public PackageScanner(Report finalReport,
                      java.io.File baseDir,
                      java.lang.String className)
Create a new PackageScanner scanning a specific file or a recursively through a directory if target is an empty string.

Parameters:
finalReport - The Report to submit collected data to.
baseDir - The root directory from which .class files should be scanned. This is typically directory containing the root of your compiled classes.
className - The name of the .class file to scan or an empty string to scan recursively through baseDir.

PackageScanner

                      java.io.File baseDir)
See PackageScanner(Report, java.io.File, String) target = "".

Parameters:
finalReport - The Report to submit collected data to.
baseDir - The root directory from which .class files should be scanned. This is typically directory containing the root of your compiled classes.

                   throws java.io.IOException
Scan QA annotations for a file or recursively through a directory.

analyzeClass

public final ReportElement[] analyzeClass(java.lang.Class classTarget,
                                          java.lang.String filename)
Beware: This class may throw exotic exceptions since it deals with binary class data.

Parameters:
classTarget - The class to analyze.
filename - The file containing the class.
Returns:
An array of ReportElements extracted from the members of the class and the class it self.
